name: Cheez-It Cursor (ROBLOX) [READ DESCRIPTION] Update
description:
⚠️HOW TO MAKE THE MOUSE ONLY APPEAR ON THE ROBLOX WEBSITE⚠️ :
Steps :
1. https://pasteboard.co/GLAZQ1m.png Click on the icon.
2. https://pasteboard.co/GLB065E.png Click the pencil icon.
3. https://pasteboard.co/HqjikVs.png Click "Specify"
4. https://pasteboard.co/HqjiN9I.png Change "URL" to "URLs on the domain" and type in "roblox.com".
4. https://pasteboard.co/GLB0JFi.png Click save and you're done.
